title: Protesters Try to Storm U.S. Consulate in Karachi, Pakistan
summary_full: At least 22 people were killed in protests across Pakistan as Iran’s neighbors brace for turmoil and the fallout of a possible regional conflict.
summary_public: At least 22 people were killed in protests across Pakistan as Iran’s neighbors brace for turmoil and the fallout of a possible regional conflict.
